title: The Rise of Arnaud De Lie: From Farmer’s Son to Burgeoning Sprint Talent
content:
The 21-year-old dreams of winning the Tour of Flanders and has no plans to go back to his roots and mix mountain bike and road.

Read the full article at The Rise of Arnaud De Lie: From Farmer’s Son to Burgeoning Sprint Talent on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
